testprocedure.test-case-summary: This test procedure is called by a test case and is used to verify the SUTs support of the dlDetectorInventoryRequest dialog as an OC using variables provided by the calling test case. This procedure supports verification of requirements related to user need 2.3.5.1.1 [Need to Share Detector Inventory] and is used for both valid and invalid test cases.

testStep.functionId: Step 1 CONFIGURE: Determine the Application Layer Standard that will be used for this test. RECORD this information as: ApplicationLayerStandard: ${ApplicationLayerStandard}

Step 2 CONFIGURE: Determine the dialog performance requirement for Send Detector Inventory Information Upon Request (NTRM 3.3.5.2.1.1}. RECORD this value as: TMDD_N18R446_Send_Detector_Inventory_Information_Upon_Request_Parameter = ${TMDD_N18R446_Send_Detector_Inventory_Information_Upon_Request_Parameter}

Step 3 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Restrictions - Device Inventory is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.2.1.2.1). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N18R380_Restrictions___Device_Inventory_Supported = ${TMDD_N18R380_Restrictions___Device_Inventory_Supported}

Step 4 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Device Description is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.2.1.2.2). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N18R381_Device_Description_Supported = ${TMDD_N18R381_Device_Description_Supported}

Step 5 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Device Control Type is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.2.1.2.3). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N18R382_Device_Control_Type_Supported = ${TMDD_N18R382_Device_Control_Type_Supported}

Step 6 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Controller Description is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.2.1.2.4). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N18R383_Controller_Description_Supported = ${TMDD_N18R383_Controller_Description_Supported}

Step 7 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Roadway Network Identifier - Device Inventory is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.2.1.2.5). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N18R384_Roadway_Network_Identifier___Device_Inventory_Supported = ${TMDD_N18R384_Roadway_Network_Identifier___Device_Inventory_Supported}

Step 8 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Node Identifier - Device Inventory is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.2.1.2.6). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N18R385_Node_Identifier___Device_Inventory_Supported = ${TMDD_N18R385_Node_Identifier___Device_Inventory_Supported}

Step 9 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Node Name - Device Inventory is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.2.1.2.7). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N18R386_Node_Name___Device_Inventory_Supported = ${TMDD_N18R386_Node_Name___Device_Inventory_Supported}

Step 10 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Link Identifier - Device Inventory is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.2.1.2.8). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N18R387_Link_Identifier___Device_Inventory_Supported = ${TMDD_N18R387_Link_Identifier___Device_Inventory_Supported}

Step 11 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Link Name - Device Inventory is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.2.1.2.9). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N18R388_Link_Name___Device_Inventory_Supported = ${TMDD_N18R388_Link_Name___Device_Inventory_Supported}

Step 12 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Link Direction - Device Inventory is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.2.1.2.10). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N18R389_Link_Direction___Device_Inventory_Supported = ${TMDD_N18R389_Link_Direction___Device_Inventory_Supported}

Step 13 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Linear Reference - Device Inventory is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.2.1.2.11). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N18R390_Linear_Reference___Device_Inventory_Supported = ${TMDD_N18R390_Linear_Reference___Device_Inventory_Supported}

Step 14 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Linear Reference Version is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.2.1.2.12). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N18R391_Linear_Reference_Version_Supported = ${TMDD_N18R391_Linear_Reference_Version_Supported}

Step 15 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Route Designator - Device Inventory is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.2.1.2.13). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N18R392_Route_Designator___Device_Inventory_Supported = ${TMDD_N18R392_Route_Designator___Device_Inventory_Supported}

Step 16 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Device Uniform Resource Locator (URL) (DeviceURL) is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.2.1.2.14). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N18R393_Device_Uniform_Resource_Locator__URL___DeviceURL__Supported = ${TMDD_N18R393_Device_Uniform_Resource_Locator__URL___DeviceURL__Supported}

Step 17 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Device URL Reference Medium is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.2.1.2.15). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N18R394_Device_URL_Reference_Medium_Supported = ${TMDD_N18R394_Device_URL_Reference_Medium_Supported}

Step 18 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Device Inventory Date and Time Change Information is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.2.1.2.16). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N18R395_Device_Inventory_Date_and_Time_Change_Information_Supported = ${TMDD_N18R395_Device_Inventory_Date_and_Time_Change_Information_Supported}

Step 19 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Detector Station Inventory Information is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.2.1.5.2.1). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N18R452_Detector_Station_Inventory_Information_Supported = ${TMDD_N18R452_Detector_Station_Inventory_Information_Supported}

Step 20 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Lane Number - Detector Inventory is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.2.1.5.2.2). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N18R453_Lane_Number___Detector_Inventory_Supported = ${TMDD_N18R453_Lane_Number___Detector_Inventory_Supported}

Step 21 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Speed Trap Flag is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.2.1.5.2.3). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N18R454_Speed_Trap_Flag_Supported = ${TMDD_N18R454_Speed_Trap_Flag_Supported}

Step 22 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Vehicle Bin 1 is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.2.1.5.2.4). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N18R455_Vehicle_Bin_1_Supported = ${TMDD_N18R455_Vehicle_Bin_1_Supported}

Step 23 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Vehicle Bin 2 is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.2.1.5.2.5). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N18R456_Vehicle_Bin_2_Supported = ${TMDD_N18R456_Vehicle_Bin_2_Supported}

Step 24 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Vehicle Bin 3 is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.2.1.5.2.6). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N18R457_Vehicle_Bin_3_Supported = ${TMDD_N18R457_Vehicle_Bin_3_Supported}

Step 25 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Vehicle Bin 4 is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.2.1.5.2.7). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N18R458_Vehicle_Bin_4_Supported = ${TMDD_N18R458_Vehicle_Bin_4_Supported}

Step 26 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Vehicle Bin 5 is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.2.1.5.2.8). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N18R459_Vehicle_Bin_5_Supported = ${TMDD_N18R459_Vehicle_Bin_5_Supported}

Step 27 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Vehicle Bin 6 is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.2.1.5.2.9). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N18R460_Vehicle_Bin_6_Supported = ${TMDD_N18R460_Vehicle_Bin_6_Supported}

Step 28 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Restrictions - Error Report is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.1.4.1.2.1). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N18R15_Restrictions___Error_Report_Supported = ${TMDD_N18R15_Restrictions___Error_Report_Supported}

Step 29 CONFIGURE: Determine whether TMDD v3.0x Detector Inventory - Detector Type is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.7.3). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N18R1196_TMDD_v30x_Detector_Inventory___Detector_Type_Supported = ${TMDD_N18R1196_TMDD_v30x_Detector_Inventory___Detector_Type_Supported}
Step 30 CONFIGURE: Define the message that will be sent to the SUT. RECORD this information as: RequestMessage: ${RequestMessage}
Step 31 CONFIGURE: Determine whether an error response message is expected for this test. RECORD this information as: ErrorResponseExpected: ${ErrorResponseExpected}
Step 32 CONFIGURE: IF ErrorResponseExpected is true, determine the expected error code response for this test. RECORD this information as: ErrorTypeExpected: ${ErrorTypeExpected}

Step 33 REQUEST-RESPONSE-EC with the following parameters: DIALOG=dlDetectorInventoryRequest RESPONSETIMEREQUIRED=TMDD_N18R446_Send_Detector_Inventory_Information_Upon_Request_Parameter REQUESTMESSAGE = RequestMessage ERRORRESPONSEEXPECTED = ErrorResponseExpected ERRORTYPEEXPECTED = ErrorTypeExpected

Step 34 IF ErrorResponseExpected is not equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE, OTHERWISE skip the following substeps. Note: If a verification step fails, then test execution will proceed at the next subsequent Post Condition step, if present. Otherwise, test execution will proceed to the final Exit step.
Step 34.1 VERIFY that a detector-inventory-header data frame exists within each instance of data frame detectorInventoryMsg.detector-inventory-item.detector-inventory-list.detector
Step 34.2 VERIFY that a detector-station-inventory-header data frame exists within each instance of data frame detectorInventoryMsg.detector-inventory-item

Step 34.3 VERIFY that an organization-information data frame exists within each instance of data frame detectorInventoryMsg.detector-inventory-item.detector-inventory-list.detector.detector-inventory-header
Step 34.4 VERIFY that a device-id data element exists within each instance of data frame detectorInventoryMsg.detector-inventory-item.detector-inventory-list.detector.detector-inventory-header
Step 34.5 VERIFY that a device-location data frame exists within each instance of data frame detectorInventoryMsg.detector-inventory-item.detector-inventory-list.detector.detector-inventory-header
Step 34.6 VERIFY that a device-name data element exists within each instance of data frame detectorInventoryMsg.detector-inventory-item.detector-inventory-list.detector.detector-inventory-header
Step 34.7 VERIFY that a detectorInventoryMsg message was received.
Step 34.8 VERIFY that a detector-inventory-header data frame exists within each instance of data frame detectorInventoryMsg.detector-inventory-item.detector-inventory-list.detector
Step 34.9 VERIFY that a detector-type data element exists within each instance of data frame detectorInventoryMsg.detector-inventory-item.detector-inventory-list.detector
Step 34.10 IF TMDD_N18R380_Restrictions___Device_Inventory_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 34.10.1 VERIFY that a restrictions data frame exists within each instance of data frame detectorInventoryMsg.detector-inventory-item.detector-inventory-list.detector.detector-inventory-header
Step 34.11 IF TMDD_N18R381_Device_Description_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.

Step 34.11.1 VERIFY that a device-description data element exists within each instance of data frame detectorInventoryMsg.detector-inventory-item.detector-inventory-list.detector.detector-inventory-header
Step 34.12 IF TMDD_N18R382_Device_Control_Type_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.

Step 34.12.1 VERIFY that a device-control-type data element exists within each instance of data frame detectorInventoryMsg.detector-inventory-item.detector-inventory-list.detector.detector-inventory-header
Step 34.13 IF TMDD_N18R383_Controller_Description_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.

Step 34.13.1 VERIFY that a controller-description data element exists within each instance of data frame detectorInventoryMsg.detector-inventory-item.detector-inventory-list.detector.detector-inventory-header
Step 34.14 IF TMDD_N18R384_Roadway_Network_Identifier___Device_Inventory_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 34.14.1 VERIFY that a network-id data element exists within each instance of data frame detectorInventoryMsg.detector-inventory-item.detector-inventory-list.detector.detector-inventory-header
Step 34.15 IF TMDD_N18R385_Node_Identifier___Device_Inventory_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 34.15.1 VERIFY that a node-id data element exists within each instance of data frame detectorInventoryMsg.detector-inventory-item.detector-inventory-list.detector.detector-inventory-header
Step 34.16 IF TMDD_N18R386_Node_Name___Device_Inventory_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 34.16.1 VERIFY that a node-name data element exists within each instance of data frame detectorInventoryMsg.detector-inventory-item.detector-inventory-list.detector.detector-inventory-header
Step 34.17 IF TMDD_N18R387_Link_Identifier___Device_Inventory_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 34.17.1 VERIFY that a link-id data element exists within each instance of data frame detectorInventoryMsg.detector-inventory-item.detector-inventory-list.detector.detector-inventory-header
Step 34.18 IF TMDD_N18R388_Link_Name___Device_Inventory_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 34.18.1 VERIFY that a link-name data element exists within each instance of data frame detectorInventoryMsg.detector-inventory-item.detector-inventory-list.detector.detector-inventory-header
Step 34.19 IF TMDD_N18R389_Link_Direction___Device_Inventory_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.

Step 34.19.1 VERIFY that a link-direction data element exists within each instance of data frame detectorInventoryMsg.detector-inventory-item.detector-inventory-list.detector.detector-inventory-header
Step 34.20 IF TMDD_N18R390_Linear_Reference___Device_Inventory_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.

Step 34.20.1 VERIFY that a linear-reference data element exists within each instance of data frame detectorInventoryMsg.detector-inventory-item.detector-inventory-list.detector.detector-inventory-header
Step 34.21 IF TMDD_N18R391_Linear_Reference_Version_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.

Step 34.21.1 VERIFY that a linear-reference-version data element exists within each instance of data frame detectorInventoryMsg.detector-inventory-item.detector-inventory-list.detector.detector-inventory-header
Step 34.22 IF TMDD_N18R392_Route_Designator___Device_Inventory_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.

Step 34.22.1 VERIFY that a route-designator data element exists within each instance of data frame detectorInventoryMsg.detector-inventory-item.detector-inventory-list.detector.detector-inventory-header
Step 34.23 IF TMDD_N18R393_Device_Uniform_Resource_Locator__URL___DeviceURL__Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 34.23.1 VERIFY that a device-url data frame exists within each instance of data frame detectorInventoryMsg.detector-inventory-item.detector-inventory-list.detector.detector-inventory-header
Step 34.24 IF TMDD_N18R394_Device_URL_Reference_Medium_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.

Step 34.24.1 VERIFY that an url-reference-medium data element exists within each instance of data frame detectorInventoryMsg.detector-inventory-item.detector-inventory-list.detector.detector-inventory-header.device-url
Step 34.25 IF TMDD_N18R395_Device_Inventory_Date_and_Time_Change_Information_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.

Step 34.25.1 VERIFY that a last-update-time data frame exists within each instance of data frame detectorInventoryMsg.detector-inventory-item.detector-inventory-list.detector.detector-inventory-header
Step 34.26 IF TMDD_N18R452_Detector_Station_Inventory_Information_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 34.26.1 VERIFY that a detector-station-inventory-header data frame exists within each instance of data frame detectorInventoryMsg.detector-inventory-item
Step 34.27 IF TMDD_N18R453_Lane_Number___Detector_Inventory_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 34.27.1 VERIFY that a detection-lanes data frame exists within each instance of data frame detectorInventoryMsg.detector-inventory-item.detector-inventory-list.detector
Step 34.28 IF TMDD_N18R454_Speed_Trap_Flag_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 34.28.1 VERIFY that an is-detector-speed-trap-flag data element exists within each instance of data frame detectorInventoryMsg.detector-inventory-item.detector-inventory-list.detector
Step 34.29 IF TMDD_N18R455_Vehicle_Bin_1_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 34.29.1 VERIFY that a vehicle-classification-bin1 data element exists within each instance of data frame detectorInventoryMsg.detector-inventory-item.detector-inventory-list.detector
Step 34.30 IF TMDD_N18R456_Vehicle_Bin_2_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 34.30.1 VERIFY that a vehicle-classification-bin2 data element exists within each instance of data frame detectorInventoryMsg.detector-inventory-item.detector-inventory-list.detector
Step 34.31 IF TMDD_N18R457_Vehicle_Bin_3_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 34.31.1 VERIFY that a vehicle-classification-bin3 data element exists within each instance of data frame detectorInventoryMsg.detector-inventory-item.detector-inventory-list.detector
Step 34.32 IF TMDD_N18R458_Vehicle_Bin_4_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 34.32.1 VERIFY that a vehicle-classification-bin4 data element exists within each instance of data frame detectorInventoryMsg.detector-inventory-item.detector-inventory-list.detector
Step 34.33 IF TMDD_N18R459_Vehicle_Bin_5_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 34.33.1 VERIFY that a vehicle-classification-bin5 data element exists within each instance of data frame detectorInventoryMsg.detector-inventory-item.detector-inventory-list.detector
Step 34.34 IF TMDD_N18R460_Vehicle_Bin_6_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 34.34.1 VERIFY that a vehicle-classification-bin6 data element exists within each instance of data frame detectorInventoryMsg.detector-inventory-item.detector-inventory-list.detector
Step 34.35 IF TMDD_N18R1196_TMDD_v30x_Detector_Inventory___Detector_Type_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.

Step 34.35.1 VERIFY that a detector-type-extended data element exists within each instance of data frame detectorInventoryMsg.detector-inventory-item.detector-inventory-list.detector.tmddX:detectorInventoryDetailsExt
Step 34.36 VERIFY that the values within the RESPONSE message are correct per the TMDD standard and known operational conditions.

USER-VERIFY-MESSAGE.functionId: The User Verifies the message content

testStep.functionId: Step 35 IF ErrorResponseExpected is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE, OTHERWISE skip the following substeps. If a verification step fails, then test execution will proceed at the next subsequent Post Condition step, if present. Otherwise, test execution will proceed to the final Exit step.
Step 35.1 VERIFY that an errorReportMsg message was received.
Step 35.2 VERIFY that an organization-information data frame exists within message errorReportMsg.
Step 35.3 VERIFY that an organization-requesting data frame exists within message errorReportMsg.
Step 35.4 VERIFY that an error-code data element exists within message errorReportMsg.
Step 35.5 VERIFY that an error-text data element exists within message errorReportMsg.
Step 35.6 VERIFY that data element error-code is set to ErrorResponseTypeExpected.
Step 35.7 IF TMDD_N18R15_Restrictions___Error_Report_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 35.7.1 VERIFY that a restrictions data frame exists within message errorReportMsg.
Step 36 EXIT
